verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu tāṅre āsite ājñā diyā
nīlācale calilā prabhu ānandita hañā

synonyms: tabe—then; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto him; āsite—to come; ājñā diyā—giving an order; nīlācale—to Jagannātha Purī; calilā—departed; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ānandita hañā—with great pleasure.
translation: Giving orders to Rāmānanda Rāya to come to Nīlācala, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu departed for Jagannātha Purī with great pleasure.
